LessorOperatingLeasePaymentsToBeReceived.label: Lessor, Operating Lease, Payments to be Received
LessorOperatingLeasePaymentsToBeReceived.description: Amount of lease payments to be received by lessor for operating lease.

CashUninsuredAmount.label: Cash, Uninsured Amount
CashUninsuredAmount.description: The amount of cash as of the balance sheet date that is not insured by the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation.

DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseReser.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Reserves and Accruals, Other
DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseReser.description: Amount, before allocation of valuation allowance, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from reserves and accruals, classified as other.

DefinedBenefitPlanAssetsTransferredToFro.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Plan Assets, Increase (Decrease) for Assets Transferred to (from) Plan
DefinedBenefitPlanAssetsTransferredToFro.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in plan assets of defined benefit plan from assets transferred into (from) plan.

DefinedBenefitPlanBenefitObligationPerio.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Benefit Obligation, Period Increase (Decrease)
DefinedBenefitPlanBenefitObligationPerio.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in benefit obligation of defined benefit plan.

DefinedBenefitPlanOtherChanges.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Benefit Obligation, Increase (Decrease) for Other Change
DefinedBenefitPlanOtherChanges.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in benefit obligation of defined benefit plan from change, classified as other.

DefinedBenefitPlanOtherCosts.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Other Cost (Credit)
DefinedBenefitPlanOtherCosts.description: Amount of defined benefit plan cost (credit), classified as other.

DefinedBenefitPlanRecognizedNetGainLossD.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Net Periodic Benefit Cost (Credit), Gain (Loss) Due to Settlement
DefinedBenefitPlanRecognizedNetGainLossD.description: Amount of gain (loss) recognized in net periodic benefit (cost) credit from irrevocable action relieving primary responsibility for benefit obligation and eliminating risk related to obligation and assets used to effect settlement.

PaymentsOfDebtIssuanceCosts.label: Payments of Debt Issuance Costs
PaymentsOfDebtIssuanceCosts.description: The cash outflow paid to third parties in connection with debt origination, which will be amortized over the remaining maturity period of the associated long-term debt.

RepaymentsOfLinesOfCredit.label: Repayments of Lines of Credit
RepaymentsOfLinesOfCredit.description: Amount of cash outflow for payment of an obligation from a lender, including but not limited to, letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements.

AccrualForTaxesOtherThanIncomeTaxesCurre.label: Accrual for Taxes Other than Income Taxes
AccrualForTaxesOtherThanIncomeTaxesCurre.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for real and property taxes.

AccruedIncomeTaxes.label: Accrued Income Taxes
AccruedIncomeTaxes.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the unpaid sum of the known and estimated amounts payable to satisfy all domestic and foreign income tax obligations due. This amount is the total of current and noncurrent accrued income taxes.

AccruedLiabilitiesCurrentAndNoncurrent.label: Accrued Liabilities
AccruedLiabilitiesCurrentAndNoncurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable, pertaining to costs that are statutory in nature, are incurred on contractual obligations, or accumulate over time and for which invoices have not yet been received or will not be rendered. Examples include taxes, interest, rent and utilities.

AccruedProfessionalFeesCurrentAndNoncurr.label: Accrued Professional Fees
AccruedProfessionalFeesCurrentAndNoncurr.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for professional fees, such as for legal and accounting services received.

AccruedSalesCommissionCurrent.label: Accrued Sales Commission, Current
AccruedSalesCommissionCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for sales commissions. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

DefinedBenefitPensionPlanLiabilitiesCurr.label: Liability, Defined Benefit Pension Plan, Current
DefinedBenefitPensionPlanLiabilitiesCurr.description: Amount of liability, recognized in statement of financial position, for defined benefit pension plan, classified as current. Excludes other postretirement benefit plan.

FormerGainContingencyRecognizedInCurrent.label: Former Gain Contingency, Recognized in Current Period
FormerGainContingencyRecognizedInCurrent.description: Amount of gain recognized in the period that had been disclosed in prior periods as a contingent gain.

OtherAccruedLiabilitiesCurrentAndNoncurr.label: Other Accrued Liabilities
OtherAccruedLiabilitiesCurrentAndNoncurr.description: Amount of expenses incurred but not yet paid classified as other.

SalesAndExciseTaxPayableCurrent.label: Sales and Excise Tax Payable, Current
SalesAndExciseTaxPayableCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of liabilities incurred through that date and payable for statutory sales and use taxes, including value added tax. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

WorkersCompensationLiabilityCurrentAndNo.label: Workers' Compensation Liability
WorkersCompensationLiabilityCurrentAndNo.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations and payables pertaining to claims incurred of a workers compensation nature.

ExciseAndSalesTaxes.label: Excise and Sales Taxes
ExciseAndSalesTaxes.description: The amount of excise and sales taxes included in sales and revenues, which are then deducted as a cost of sales. Includes excise taxes, which are applied to specific types of transactions or items (such as gasoline or alcohol); and sales, use and value added taxes, which are applied to a broad class of revenue-producing transactions involving a wide range of goods and services.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeForeignCurrencyT.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Foreign Currency Transaction and Translation Adjustment, Net of Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
OtherComprehensiveIncomeForeignCurrencyT.description: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments of gain (loss) on foreign currency translation adjustments, foreign currency transactions designated and effective as economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity and intra-entity foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature, attributable to parent entity.
